metadata.title: CVE-2017-9833 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** /cgi-bin/wapopen in Boa 0.94.14rc21 allows the injection of"../.." using the FILECAMERA variable (sent by GET) to read files with rootprivileges. NOTE: multiple third parties report that this is asystem-integrator issue (e.g., a vulnerability on one type of camera)because Boa does not include any wapopen program or any code to read aFILECAMERA variable.

criterions.comment: boa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
